recipesJson.name: Caramel Rice Crispy Treats! 5 STARS
recipesJson.author: CloudyMotherChucker
recipesJson.description: I put this recipe together after trying WF CRCT as a stand alone and knowing it could be better. This one definitely breaks the mold for you dessert lovers! All you have to do is give it a try and you'll be hooked! Let me know what you think... Thanks, CloudyMotherChucker

reviews.text: One of the best rice crispy treats I've found on ATF.  WF caramel rice crispy treat is a great flavor and it definitely shines here.  I haven't found a plain crispy treat that I've thought was amazing, and I feel like I've mixed them all. Fortunately I enjoy the caramel aspect of the flavor and this recipe so as far as I'm concerned this is the best version of rice crispy I've found
